tool_description: An API showcasing different media outlets take on the impact that global warming has on the earth
name: Global climate change
title: Global climate change

api_list.name: Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Obtain climate change and global warming news from independent news sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: News Updates
